segments.text: I see the girl standing there, and she looks so innocent and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, and it’s like she’s just waiting for a little piece of happiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the kind of kid who always looks on the bright side of things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking up at the boy, it’s like she really believes in him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been disappointed before or if she’s always this optimistic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, but she’s just patiently waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how hopeful she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s standing there, it’s like she’s not even worried about the stool tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just happy to be part of the adventure, even if it’s a little dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking at the boy, it’s like she trusts him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gives her a cookie and doesn’t let her down.
segments.speaker: PAR
